verses.name: Joshua 24:3
verses.text: And I took your father Abraham from the other side of the flood, and led him throughout all the land of Canaan, and multiplied his seed, and gave him Isaac.

verses.name: Joshua 24:4
verses.text: And I gave unto Isaac Jacob and Esau: and I gave unto Esau mount Seir, to possess it; but Jacob and his children went down into Egypt.

verses.name: Joshua 24:5
verses.text: I sent Moses also and Aaron, and I plagued Egypt, according to that which I did among them: and afterward I brought you out.
